column4: Unit Size：φ282xH79mm；Actual Power：2200W；Supply Voltage：220-240V~50/60Hz；Control：Knob control，2 red LEDs；Glass size：φ282mm，black color，artwork can be customized；Timer：No；Length of Power Cord：1.2mtr；Packaging accessories：User manual，PE bag，inner tray，gift box，carton；Net weight：2.2KG；Container information：1 pcs/gift box，8 pcs/carton
